duck: Heart Attack (album) - Heart Attack is the tenth studio album by the Swiss hard rock band Krokus, and is described by the band as "the last attempt to keep the band together in a deep crisis".
Karp-Flatt Metric - The Karpâ€“Flatt Metric is a measure of parallelization of code in parallel processor systems.
Gustafson's law - Gustafson's Law is a law in computer science which says that computations involving arbitrarily large data sets can be efficiently parallelized.

In parallel computing, speedup refers to how much a parallel algorithm is faster than a corresponding sequential algorithm.
velocity - In kinematics, velocity is the rate of change of the position of an object, equivalent to a specification of its speed and direction of motion.

In parallel computing, 'speedup' refers to how much a parallel algorithm is
faster than a corresponding sequential algorithm.
